job_description:
Data Science Training & Internship ‚Äì CPInt-Elligence Tech Solutions Plc (UK-Based)Remote | 3 Months | Industry-Recognised Certificate | 1:1 UK Mentorship | January 2026The UK job market continues to face a shortage of skilled data professionals. Organisations across industries are actively seeking individuals who can turn data into meaningful insights and business value.Data science is no longer optional - it is becoming a core capability for growth-driven organisations in the UK.About 46% of UK businesses said they struggled to recruit for roles requiring data skills over the past two years(GOV.UK)Why Consider This Program?UK Skills Gap: A significant proportion of UK data roles remain unfilled due to a shortage of job-ready candidates (STEM Learning).Portfolio-Led Learning: Build up to 5 real-world projects, including use cases such as fraud detection, forex analysis, and sales forecasting.UK-Based Credibility: Training delivered by a UK-based technology firm, aligned with current local industry expectations and standards.Program OverviewData Science Training & Internship - CPThis learning-focused internship is designed to help participants strengthen their practical data science skills through structured guidance, hands-on project work, and mentorship.What You‚Äôll GainReal-World Project ExperienceApply data science techniques to real scenarios and develop a portfolio suitable for entry-level and transition roles.Mentorship from UK Industry ProfessionalsLearn under the guidance of data specialists with experience across FTSE-listed companies, AI start-ups, and enterprise environments.Industry-Recognised CertificationParticipants who successfully complete the program will be eligible for a Microsoft-partnered industry certificate.Practical Tool ExposureGain experience with frameworks and technologies commonly used by UK employers.Key Tools & TechnologiesPython ‚Äì Core programming for data analysisNumPy & Pandas ‚Äì Data preparation and manipulationMatplotlib & Seaborn ‚Äì Visualisation and to gain UK-aligned project experienceApplicants should have basic working knowledge of Pythonüìå Important InformationThis is an unpaid training and internship certificate program, structured key_requirements: Deploying APIs and interactive data applications (Flask, Streamlit)
Ability to turn data into meaningful insights and business value
Graduates/final-year students in STEM, computer science, or analytics
job_analysis.selected_projects_reasoning: Selected 'DocuCare AI' for its strong alignment with AI pipeline development, advanced LLM integration (Gemini, Claude), RAG, and data extraction, directly showcasing expertise in machine learning and data processing for insights. 'Smart Student Job Agent Platform (Unihustle)' was chosen for its use of Python, Flask (explicitly mentioned in the JD), backend data processing, algorithmic matching with weighted vectors, and database design. 'FlowerGen | Text-to-Image Generation System' from the generic CV is retained for its demonstration of Generative AI, deep learning models (Stable Diffusion, LoRA), Python, and GPU optimization, which are highly relevant to cutting-edge AI/ML roles and complement the other data science projects well. These projects collectively cover a wide range of critical skills outlined in the job description.

tailored_cv.professional_summary: Aspiring AI/ML professional and Master's student with a strong foundation in Python, data analysis, and machine learning, eager to translate complex data into actionable insights and business value. Proven ability to develop and optimize AI models, build data-driven applications using Flask, and apply advanced data processing techniques. Passionate about continuous learning and contributing to innovative solutions that address critical industry challenges, particularly within the UK's growing data science sector.

education.degree: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence

other_degrees.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
other_degrees.university: Vivekanand Education Society‚Äôs Institute of Technology, Mumbai, India

experience.title: Salesforce Administrator Intern
achievements: Automated Salesforce workflows and validation rules, improving CRM data accuracy by 20% and streamlining operations.
Designed and implemented travel management modules with interactive dashboards for enhanced reporting and data visibility.
Collaborated cross-functionally to translate complex business requirements into scalable and efficient technical configurations.

experience.title: Technology Foundations Virtual Experience
experience.description: End-to-end Agile SDLC simulation with a focus on Python.
achievements: Successfully completed an end-to-end Agile SDLC simulation, applying DevOps and automation tools.
Debugged and optimised Python scripts, enhancing runtime efficiency by 30%.
Presented complex algorithmic solutions with clear flow diagrams, improving technical communication and understanding.

projects.title: DocuCare AI - AI-Powered Medical Document Management System
projects.description: An AI-powered web application for streamlining medical document management and analysis.
achievements: Developed a server-side AI pipeline utilizing Google Gemini 1.5 Flash for advanced OCR and intelligent medical data extraction.
Implemented an intelligent RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) chat system using vector embeddings for efficient querying of health records and providing summarized insights.
Re-architected backend infrastructure to a 100% free-tier compatible stack using Supabase, replacing expensive cloud services.

projects.title: Smart Student Job Agent Platform (Unihustle)
projects.description: A comprehensive job aggregation and matching platform tailored for students, automating local search.
achievements: Architected a specific job matching engine using weighted vectors to optimize relevance based on location, schedule, and skill overlapping.
Engineered asynchronous background worker pipelines with Celery and Redis to efficiently scrape external job boards without impacting platform performance.
Designed a normalized PostgreSQL schema with SQLAlchemy ORM for robust and scalable modeling of complex relationships between job postings, students, and skills.

projects.title: FlowerGen | Text-to-Image Generation System
projects.description: A generative AI model for realistic text-to-image generation.
achievements: Built a generative AI model leveraging Stable Diffusion and LoRA for high-fidelity text-to-image synthesis.
Optimised GPU training on an RTX 3050, achieving a 25% reduction in memory usage and improved model efficiency.
Integrated real-time data pipelines to enhance the interactive user experience, showcasing practical deployment considerations for AI models.
